(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (VP (VBD Did)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (VBP know)
            (SBAR (IN that)
              (S
                (NP (DT this) (NN year))
                (VP (VBZ marks)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT the) (JJ 150th) (NN anniversary))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT the) (NN invention))
                        (PP (IN of)
                          (NP (DT that) (JJ iconic) (JJ British) (NN dish))))))))))))
      (, ,))))


root(ROOT-0, Did-1)
nsubj(know-3, you-2)
ccomp(Did-1, know-3)
mark(marks-7, that-4)
det(year-6, this-5)
nsubj(marks-7, year-6)
ccomp(know-3, marks-7)
det(anniversary-10, the-8)
amod(anniversary-10, 150th-9)
dobj(marks-7, anniversary-10)
prep(anniversary-10, of-11)
det(invention-13, the-12)
pobj(of-11, invention-13)
prep(invention-13, of-14)
det(dish-18, that-15)
amod(dish-18, iconic-16)
amod(dish-18, British-17)
pobj(of-14, dish-18)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (NP
      (NP (NN Fish))
      (CC and)
      (NP (NNP Chips)))
    (. ?)))


root(ROOT-0, Fish-1)
cc(Fish-1, and-2)
conj(Fish-1, Chips-3)


(ROOT
  (S
    (SBAR (IN In) (NN order)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB celebrate)))))
    (NP (DT this) (NN simple))
    (ADVP (RB yet))
    (VP (VBZ undeniably)
      (NP (JJ addictive) (JJ British) (NN fare)))
    (, ,)))


mark(celebrate-4, In-1)
dep(celebrate-4, order-2)
aux(celebrate-4, to-3)
advcl(undeniably-8, celebrate-4)
det(simple-6, this-5)
nsubj(undeniably-8, simple-6)
advmod(undeniably-8, yet-7)
root(ROOT-0, undeniably-8)
amod(fare-11, addictive-9)
amod(fare-11, British-10)
dobj(undeniably-8, fare-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (VP (VBN asked)
        (NP (PRP$ our) (NN friend))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(asked-3, I-1)
aux(asked-3, have-2)
root(ROOT-0, asked-3)
poss(friend-5, our-4)
dobj(asked-3, friend-5)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (NP (NNP Chef) (NNP Tim))
    (S
      (VP (TO to)
        (VP (VB show)
          (NP (PRP us))
          (SBAR
            (WHADVP (WRB how))
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB make)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT a)
                      (ADJP (RB really) (JJ good))
                      (NN fish))
                    (CC and)
                    (NP (NNS chips))))))))))
    (. !)))


nn(Tim-2, Chef-1)
root(ROOT-0, Tim-2)
aux(show-4, to-3)
dep(Tim-2, show-4)
dobj(show-4, us-5)
advmod(make-8, how-6)
aux(make-8, to-7)
xcomp(show-4, make-8)
det(fish-12, a-9)
advmod(good-11, really-10)
amod(fish-12, good-11)
dobj(make-8, fish-12)
cc(fish-12, and-13)
conj(fish-12, chips-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (NNS chips))
    (VP
      (VP (VBD were)
        (ADJP (JJ excellent)))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBZ has)
        (NP (DT that) (JJ real) (NN potato) (NN taste))))
    (, ,)))


det(chips-2, The-1)
nsubj(excellent-4, chips-2)
cop(excellent-4, were-3)
root(ROOT-0, excellent-4)
cc(excellent-4, and-5)
conj(excellent-4, has-6)
det(taste-10, that-7)
amod(taste-10, real-8)
nn(taste-10, potato-9)
dobj(has-6, taste-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (PP (IN unlike)
      (NP
        (NP (JJS most))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (DT the) (JJ frozen) (NNS chips)))))
    (NP (DT that))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (VP (VBG being)
        (VP (VBN served)
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (NNS restaurants)))
          (ADVP (RB nowadays)))))
    (. .)))


prep(served-10, unlike-1)
pobj(unlike-1, most-2)
prep(most-2, of-3)
det(chips-6, the-4)
amod(chips-6, frozen-5)
pobj(of-3, chips-6)
nsubjpass(served-10, that-7)
aux(served-10, are-8)
auxpass(served-10, being-9)
root(ROOT-0, served-10)
prep(served-10, in-11)
pobj(in-11, restaurants-12)
advmod(served-10, nowadays-13)


(ROOT
  (S (CC But)
    (NP (DT the) (JJ real) (NN surprise))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP
          (NP (NNP Tim) (POS 's))
          (NNP Beer) (NNP Batter))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT which))
          (S
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (NP (DT the) (NN crunchiest))))
          (, ,))))))


cc(Batter-9, But-1)
det(surprise-4, the-2)
amod(surprise-4, real-3)
nsubj(Batter-9, surprise-4)
cop(Batter-9, is-5)
poss(Batter-9, Tim-6)
possessive(Tim-6, 's-7)
nn(Batter-9, Beer-8)
root(ROOT-0, Batter-9)
nsubj(crunchiest-13, which-10)
cop(crunchiest-13, is-11)
det(crunchiest-13, the-12)
rcmod(Batter-9, crunchiest-13)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (ADJP (RBS most) (JJ satisfying))
      (NN fish) (NNP I))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (VP (VBN eaten)
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP (DT a) (JJ long) (NN while)))))
    (. !)))

amod(I-4, satisfying-2)
nn(I-4, fish-3)
nsubj(eaten-6, I-4)
aux(eaten-6, have-5)
root(ROOT-0, eaten-6)
prep(eaten-6, for-7)
det(while-10, a-8)
amod(while-10, long-9)
pobj(for-7, while-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (RB Here))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN recipe))
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP (JJ easy) (NN reference)))))
    (. .)))

det(recipe-4, the-3)
root(ROOT-0, recipe-4)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (NNP Tim) (POS 's))
      (NNP Beer) (NNP Batter) (NNP Recipe) (NNP Plain) (NNP Flour) (CD 200g) (NNP Rice) (NNP Flour) (CD 200g) (NNP Baking) (NNP Powder) (CD 1) (NNP tsp) (NNP Honey) (CD 1) (NNP Tblsp) (NNP Salt) (CD 1) (NN tsp) (NNS Water))
    (VP (VBZ 100mls)
      (NP
        (NP (NNP Beer) (NNPS 500mls)
          (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
            (NP (NN ice) (NN cold))
            (-RRB- -RRB-))
          (NNP Hope))
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (VBP enjoy)
              (NP (DT the) (NNS videos)))))))
    (. !)))


poss(Water-22, Tim-1)
possessive(Tim-1, 's-2)
nn(Water-22, Beer-3)
nn(Water-22, Batter-4)
nn(Water-22, Recipe-5)
nn(Water-22, Plain-6)
nn(Water-22, Flour-7)
num(Water-22, 200g-8)
nn(Water-22, Rice-9)
nn(Water-22, Flour-10)
num(Water-22, 200g-11)
nn(Water-22, Baking-12)
nn(Water-22, Powder-13)
num(Water-22, 1-14)
nn(Water-22, tsp-15)
nn(Water-22, Honey-16)
num(Water-22, 1-17)
nn(Water-22, Tblsp-18)
nn(Water-22, Salt-19)
num(Water-22, 1-20)
nn(Water-22, tsp-21)
nsubj(100mls-23, Water-22)
root(ROOT-0, 100mls-23)
nn(Hope-30, Beer-24)
nn(Hope-30, 500mls-25)
nn(cold-28, ice-27)
appos(Hope-30, cold-28)
dobj(100mls-23, Hope-30)
nsubj(enjoy-32, you-31)
rcmod(Hope-30, enjoy-32)
det(videos-34, the-33)
dobj(enjoy-32, videos-34)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Do)
      (VP
        (VP (VB write)
          (PRT (RP in)))
        (CC and)
        (VP (VB let)
          (S
            (NP (PRP us))
            (VP (VB know)
              (SBAR
                (WHADVP (WRB how))
                (S
                  (NP (PRP you))
                  (VP (VBD went)
                    (PP (IN with)
                      (NP
                        (NP (PRP$ your) (NN Fish))
                        (CC and)
                        (NP (NNP Chips))))))))))))
    (. !)))


aux(write-2, Do-1)
root(ROOT-0, write-2)
prt(write-2, in-3)
cc(write-2, and-4)
conj(write-2, let-5)
nsubj(know-7, us-6)
ccomp(let-5, know-7)
advmod(went-10, how-8)
nsubj(went-10, you-9)
ccomp(know-7, went-10)
prep(went-10, with-11)
poss(Fish-13, your-12)
pobj(with-11, Fish-13)
cc(Fish-13, and-14)
conj(Fish-13, Chips-15)
